text: aur ai hukkaam (vakt) agar tumhen miyo beevee kee pooree naittefaaqee ka taraphain se andesha ho to ek saalis (panch) mard ke kunabe mein se ek aur saalis aurat ke kunabe mein muqarrar karo agar ye donon saalis donon mein mel kara dena chaahen to khuda un donon ke daramiyaan usaka achchha bandobast kar dega khuda to beshak vaaqiph va khabaradaar hai
